## Mediator {.unnumbered} ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/setup_506967b0b456e8a37001fecaa572dc2f'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Load required packages library(simcausal) ``` ::: Let us consider - M is continuous variable - A is binary treatment - Y is continuous outcome ### Non-null effect - True treatment effect = 1.3 #### Data generating process ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/dgm_184392ae0928959755831f5250c44245'} ```{.r .cell-code} require(simcausal) D <- DAG.empty() D <- D + node("A", distr = "rbern", prob = plogis(-10)) + node("M", distr = "rnorm", mean = 10 + 0.9 * A, sd = 1) + node("Y", distr = "rnorm", mean = 0.5 * M + 1.3 * A, sd = .1) Dset <- set.DAG(D) ``` ::: #### Generate DAG ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/dag_de5b692cf0d6579ca09f8b368c6c67ae'} ```{.r .cell-code} plotDAG(Dset, xjitter = 0.1, yjitter = .9, edge_attrs = list(width = 0.5, arrow.width = 0.4, arrow.size = 0.7), vertex_attrs = list(size = 12, label.cex = 0.8)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](confounding2_files/figure-html/dag-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### Generate Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} require(simcausal) Obs.Data <- sim(DAG = Dset, n = 1000000, rndseed = 123) head(Obs.Data) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #### Estimate effect ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/est_631bbe9c8af5410b7956fe7aef26e11e'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Not adjusted for M fit0 <- glm(Y ~ A, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit0),2) #> (Intercept) A #> 5.00 1.69 # Adjusted for M fit <- glm(Y ~ A + M, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit),2) #> (Intercept) A M #> 0.0 1.3 0.5 ``` ::: ### Null effect - True treatment effect = 0 #### Data generating process ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/dgm0_04a216a32beb89309f213eddbfb6aaa0'} ```{.r .cell-code} require(simcausal) D <- DAG.empty() D <- D + node("A", distr = "rbern", prob = plogis(-10)) + node("M", distr = "rnorm", mean = 10 + 0.9 * A, sd = 1) + node("Y", distr = "rnorm", mean = 0.5 * M, sd = .1) Dset <- set.DAG(D) ``` ::: #### Generate DAG ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/dag0_32366d394769b623eb75ec7b1a44c060'} ```{.r .cell-code} plotDAG(Dset, xjitter = 0.1, yjitter = .9, edge_attrs = list(width = 0.5, arrow.width = 0.4, arrow.size = 0.7), vertex_attrs = list(size = 12, label.cex = 0.8)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](confounding2_files/figure-html/dag0-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### Generate Data ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} require(simcausal) Obs.Data <- sim(DAG = Dset, n = 1000000, rndseed = 123) head(Obs.Data) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #### Estimate effect ::: {.cell hash='confounding2_cache/html/est0_f725220f23b7db9803998ab5265b2824'} ```{.r .cell-code} # Not adjusted for M fit0 <- glm(Y ~ A, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit0),2) #> (Intercept) A #> 5.00 0.39 # Adjusted for M fit <- glm(Y ~ A + M, family="gaussian", data=Obs.Data) round(coef(fit),2) #> (Intercept) A M #> 0.0 0.0 0.5 ``` :::
